name: child support
details: Make a difference to a child’s life, by giving them opportunities for education and providing for basic life essentials.You can donate an entire Orphan House or give any amount towards our general Orphan Fund, which goes towards one of our many Orphan programmes including housing, bedding, food, clothing, education and even funding their weddings when they grow up!
